name: jp.nobnak.solar
description: A Unity package for calculating solar position (elevation and azimuth angles) in the horizontal coordinate system based on date, time, latitude, and longitude.

samples.description: Basic example demonstrating solar position calculation using date and time inputs. Shows how to calculate sun elevation and azimuth angles for a specific datetime.
Advanced example showing year-round solar movement animation. Includes sun direction controller, building shadows, and materials for realistic solar simulation throughout the year.
